ygData.subject: Re: Question - off topic
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the fit has hit the shan, if you ll pardon the expression. With the latest patch, making the Trueshot Bow has become a pain ... and I believe it will
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the fit has hit the shan, if you'll pardon the expression.
With the latest patch, making the Trueshot Bow has become a pain ... and I
believe it will double or triple the price of the bow:

Micro Servos and Dwarven Wire is now a NO DROP item. So people can't come
to you asking you to make them the bow with their components! You'll need
to have plenty of servos and wire of your own!

I think this is pretty good ... considering the morons on my server are
selling the TS bow for as little as 50p ! But I'm the clever one ... as i
think I was one of the first to discover the new NO DROP tags, consequently
I buy out as many of them as possible (I know it's a lore item, but I've
spread the bows out over 3 characters). Sooo ... I hope the price for this
fine piece of craftsmanship finally goes up to it's just price of 300p +.

Just wrote to warn you all of the new NO DROP status. The treant staff is
still the same ... LORE, but not NO DROP.

Why is it level 11 jerks have the audacity to bitch about the price of the
TS bow? You tell them they can't afford it cuz it's for high levs ... sigh
... some people will never grow up. I can't wait to see how much more
bitching is gonna happen whence everyone realizes they can't have their
favorite Master Fletcher make em a TS bow for free :)



Jarron of Sol Ro.
